00031 /*********************************************************************************************
00032 **********************************************************************************************
00033 
00034    Direct_method_Init
00035 
00036 **********************************************************************************************
00037 *********************************************************************************************/
00038 void Direct_method_Init(){
00039 
00040   /* Checking: */
00041   if (f_output == NULL){
00042     FMB_error("'f_output' must be set.\n");
00043   }
00044 
00045 
00046   /************************************ eps_soft_square: **********************************************/
00047   fprintf(f_output, "Softening parameter: %.1e\n", FMB_Info.eps_soft); 
00048   FMB_Info.eps_soft_square = FMB_Info.eps_soft * FMB_Info.eps_soft;
00049 
00050   /* Clear 'center' and 'half_side': */
00051   position_Initialize(&center);
00052   half_side = (COORDINATES_T) 0.0;
00053 
00054 }

00061 /*********************************************************************************************
00062 **********************************************************************************************
00063 
00064    Direct_method_Data
00065 
00066 **********************************************************************************************
00067 *********************************************************************************************/
00068 void Direct_method_Data(char *data_file){
00069   bodies_ind_t k;
00070   bodies_ind_t nb_bodies; 
00071 
00072   if (INFO_DISPLAY(2)){
00073     fprintf(f_output, "Opening data file \'%s\' for direct computation... \n", data_file); 
00074   }
00075 
00076   /* Initialize Input operations: */    
00077   FMB_IO_InitI(data_file);
00078   
00079   FMB_IO_Scan_header(&nb_bodies, &center, &half_side);
00080 
00081   if (INFO_DISPLAY(1)){
00082     fprintf(f_output, "Bodies number: ");
00083     fprintf(f_output, FORMAT_BODIES_IND_T, nb_bodies);
00084     fprintf(f_output, "\n"); 
00085     fflush(f_output);
00086   }
00087 
00088 
00089   bodies_Initialize(&bodies, nb_bodies);
00090 
00091   for (k=0; k<nb_bodies ;++k){
00092     /* We have to use 'bodies_Add()'! */
00093     body_t body_tmp;
00094     body_Initialize(&body_tmp);
00095 
00096     if (FMB_IO_Scan_body(&body_tmp) != 1){
00097       FMB_error("In Direct_method_Data(): FMB_IO_Scan_body() failed for body #%i\n", k);
00098     }
00099 
00100 /*     if (k<100){ body_Display(&body_tmp, f_output); }  */
00101     
00102     bodies_Add(&bodies, &body_tmp);
00103   }
00104 
00105   bodies_ClearFP(&bodies);
00106 
00107   /* Terminate Input operations: */
00108   FMB_IO_TerminateI();
00109 
00110 }

00115 /*********************************************************************************************
00116  ********************************************************************************************
00117 **********************************************************************************************
00118 
00119  Direct_method_Data_bodies
00120 
00121 **********************************************************************************************
00122 *********************************************************************************************/
00123  /* Same as Direct_method_Data() but we use the position and values
00124   * of all bodies stored in 'p_b' (instead of the bodies stored
00125   * in the file "data_file" in Direct_method_Data()). */
00126 void Direct_method_Data_bodies(bodies_t *p_b){
00127   
00128   bodies_it_t it;
00129 
00130   bodies_Initialize(&bodies, bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b));
00131 
00132   for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_b);
00133        bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
00134        bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
00135     /* We have to use 'bodies_Add()'! */
00136     body_t body_tmp;
00137     bodies_it_Get_body(&it, &body_tmp);
00138     bodies_Add(&bodies, &body_tmp);
00139   }
00140 
00141   bodies_ClearFP(&bodies);
00142 
00143 }

00149 /*********************************************************************************************
00150 **********************************************************************************************
00151 
00152    Direct_method_Compute
00153 
00154 **********************************************************************************************
00155 *********************************************************************************************/
00156 void Direct_method_Compute(){
00157 
00158     /********************* Without reciprocity: *******************************************/
00159     /* bodies_Compute_own_interaction_no_mutual() is not implemented ... */
00160 
00161     /********************* With reciprocity: **********************************************/
00162     /* Compute the force and the potential: */
00163     bodies_Compute_own_interaction(&bodies);        
00164 
00165 
00166     /**************** Possible scaling with CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR: ********************/
00167     /* We can also use CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR only for the total potential energy ... */
00168 #ifdef _USE_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_
00169     bodies_Scale_with_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR(&bodies);
00170 #endif /* #ifdef _USE_CONSTANT_INTERACTION_FACTOR_ */
00171 
00172 
00173 }

00183 /*********************************************************************************************
00184 **********************************************************************************************
00185 ************************* Move of the bodies: ************************************************
00186 
00187    Direct_method_Move : Leapfrog integrator ( Kick Drift Kick )  
00188 
00189 **********************************************************************************************
00190 *********************************************************************************************/
00191 
00192 void KnD_Direct_method_Move(REAL_T dt ){
00193   /**** Kick N Drift ***/
00194         bodies_it_t it;
00195  for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, &bodies);
00196       bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
00197       bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
00198    bodies_Kick_Move(&it,dt);
00199    bodies_Drift_Move(&it,dt); 
00200  }
00201 }
00202 
00203 void K_Direct_method_Move(REAL_T dt ){
00204   /************************* Move of the bodies: ******************************************/
00205   bodies_it_t it;
00206   for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, &bodies);
00207        bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
00208        bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){
00209     bodies_Kick_Move(&it,dt);
00210   }
00211 }

00222 /*********************************************************************************************
00223 **********************************************************************************************
00224 
00225    Direct_method_Terminate
00226 
00227 **********************************************************************************************
00228 *********************************************************************************************/
00229 void Direct_method_Terminate(){
00230 
00231   bodies_Free(&bodies);
00232 
00233   if (Direct_are_data_bzipped2){
00234     /* We recompress the data file: */
00235     bzip2_file(Direct_data_file);
00236   }
00237   FMB_free(Direct_data_file);
00238 
00239 }

00267 /*********************************************************************************************
00268 **********************************************************************************************
00269 
00270    sum
00271 
00272 **********************************************************************************************
00273 *********************************************************************************************/
00274 void Direct_method_Sum(char *results_file,
00275                        unsigned long step_number_value,
00276                        bodies_t *p_bodies, 
00277                        VALUES_T total_potential_energy){
00278 
00279   FILE *f_results;
00280   position_t force_sum;
00281   bodies_it_t it;
00282 
00283   f_results = f_output;
00284 
00285   position_Initialize(&force_sum);
00286   for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
00287        bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
00288        bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){ 
00289     position_Set_x(&force_sum, position_Get_x(&force_sum) + bodies_it_Get_fx(&it));
00290     position_Set_y(&force_sum, position_Get_y(&force_sum) + bodies_it_Get_fy(&it));
00291     position_Set_z(&force_sum, position_Get_z(&force_sum) + bodies_it_Get_fz(&it));
00292   }
00293   fprintf(f_results, "Sum (force): ");
00294   position_Display(&force_sum, f_results, high);
00295 
00296   fprintf(f_results, "\n");
00297 
00298 }

00307 /*********************************************************************************************
00308 **********************************************************************************************
00309 
00310    save 
00311 
00312 **********************************************************************************************
00313 *********************************************************************************************/
00314 void Direct_method_Dump_bodies(char *results_filename,
00315                                unsigned long step_number_value,
00316                                bodies_t *p_bodies){
00317   bodies_it_t it;
00318 
00319   /* Initialize Ouput operations: */    
00320   FMB_IO_InitO(results_filename);
00321   
00322   if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format != NEMO_format){
00323     
00324     /********** FMB file format: **********/
00325     if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format == FMB_binary_format){
00326       FMB_error("Unable to write the 'header' for FMB_binary_format in Direct_method_Dump_bodies(). \n");
00327     }
00328     FMB_IO_Print_header(step_number_value, FALSE /* only_position_and_value */,
00329                         bodies_Nb_bodies(p_bodies), &center, half_side);
00330     
00331     for (bodies_it_Initialize(&it, p_bodies);
00332          bodies_it_Is_valid(&it);
00333          bodies_it_Go2Next(&it)){ 
00334       
00335       FMB_IO_Print_body_from_bodies_it(&it, FALSE /* only_position_and_value */);
00336     } /* for */
00337     
00338   } /* if (FMB_IO_Info.output_format != NEMO_format) */
00339   else {
00340     /********** NEMO file format: **********/
00341     FMB_IO_Print_all_bodies_from_bodies_t(p_bodies);
00342   } /* else (FMB_IO_Info.output_format != NEMO_format) */
00343   
00344   /* Terminate Output operations: */    
00345   FMB_IO_TerminateO();
00346 
00347 }
